PONG 201

PONG 201 is a custom art piece that was created for Upside Travel. Constructed of 201 ping pong balls shaped into the company logo, it represents the fun, creative energy of a fast-paced startup.

Materials: ping pong balls, acrylic paint.

All images are owned by me and may not be used without permission.
